posts.post_content:
Today I have a nice UNGRADED xxxx for sale. The card appears vg-ex. Please see scans. Payment can be made through paypal gift or add 4% to regular paypal. The price is $500. I believe the card would grade however I do not guarantee that. Sold as is.
Thank You,
Richard
Richard, when you say that you can't guarantee the card would grade, are you talking about a numerical grade?  Or are you saying that you can't guarantee the card would even grade out as "Authentic"?

Richard, I didn't hear back from you so I'm going to go ahead and remove the card from this thread.  This isn't eBay and we can't allow cards with questionable authenticity to be sold on BST.  I realize that ungraded cards are sold here all the time but they are done so by individuals who are willing to stand behind their cards and offer a full refund if they turn out to be counterfeit.  Standing by and letting someone potentially be out several hundred dollars isn't something I'm willing to do.

Thanks for understanding and nothing personal...

-Brian
